tool_description: Tracks customer engagement streaks and awards bonus points for consecutive activity periods.

streak_type.description: Type of streak to track: daily, weekly, monthly

minimum_streak_length.description: Minimum streak length to earn bonus points

error_messages: Invalid customer_id: Customer must exist in the loyalty program.
Invalid activity_date: Must be valid ISO 8601 format and not in the future.
Invalid streak_type: Use one of [daily, weekly, monthly].
Invalid minimum_streak_length: Must be positive integer between 2 and 365.
No recent activity: Customer has no qualifying activity for streak calculation.
usage: Provide customer_id, activity_date, and streak_type. Optionally set minimum_streak_length to customize bonus thresholds.

streak_bonus_points.description: Bonus points earned for current streak

streak_status.description: Status: active, broken, milestone_reached, or starting

next_milestone.description: Next streak length that will earn additional bonus
